mapper.select: SELECT c.CHATROOM_ID , c.CHATROOM_NAME , c.LATEST_CHAT_ID , c.LATEST_MESSAGE_CONTENT , c.LATEST_MESSAGE_SENT_AT , cp.EMP_ID AS PARTICIPANT_ID, e.EMP_NAME AS PARTICIPANT_NAME , cp.JOIN_AT , cp.LEAVE_AT FROM CHATROOM c JOIN CHATROOM_PARTICIPANTS cp ON c.CHATROOM_ID = cp.CHATROOM_ID JOIN EMPLOYEE e ON cp.EMP_ID = e.EMP_ID WHERE c.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND c.CHATROOM_ID IN (SELECT CHATROOM_ID FROM CHATROOM_PARTICIPANTS WHERE EMP_ID = #{participant_id} AND LEAVE_AT IS NULL ) AND cp.LEAVE_AT IS NULL ORDER BY c.LATEST_MESSAGE_SENT_AT DESC

SELECT CONTENT ,SENT_AT ,IS_READ ,c.CHAT_SENDER, e.EMP_NAME AS CHAT_SENDER_NAME, CHAT_RECEIVER, c.CHATROOM_ID , cp.EMP_ID AS PARTICIPANT_ID, e2.EMP_NAME AS PARTICIPANT_NAME, t.TEAM_NAME AS PARTICIPANT_TEAM_NAME, JOIN_AT ,LEAVE_AT FROM CHATROOM_PARTICIPANTS cp LEFT JOIN CHAT c ON cp.CHATROOM_ID = c.CHATROOM_ID LEFT JOIN EMPLOYEE e ON c.CHAT_SENDER = e.EMP_ID JOIN EMPLOYEE e2 ON cp.EMP_ID = e2.EMP_ID JOIN TEAM t ON e2.TEAM_CODE = t.TEAM_CODE LEFT JOIN EMPLOYEE e3 ON c.CHAT_RECEIVER = e3.EMP_ID WHERE cp.CHATROOM_ID = #{chatroom_id} AND cp.LEAVE_AT IS NULL ORDER BY c.SENT_AT ASC
